data.title: 8. Heraldry, Heralds and Politics in the Republic of Florence in the Late Middle Ages
data.meta_description: 8. Heraldry, Heralds and Politics in the Republic of Florence in the Late Middle Ages was published in The Herald in Late Medieval Europe on page 133.
